comment: This professor actively contradicted the calendar for an online course regarding due dates for major assignments and refused to give extensions due to his own inconsistent or outright missing information. The material used was outdated, and he was unable to provide meaningful help outside of class to help work around issues caused by this.
Refusal to properly inform online students of due dates or updates to due dates.

Took him for Mobile game design, he was pretty good. You work in groups of up to 4 and create both a mobile game and an AR game. Several opportunities for extra credit, the projects are pretty easy, just make the game and do recorded presentations but the assignments can be a little annoying, especially the written ones (2) in how they're graded.

He doesn't have a good enough rating on here, because I had an awesome experience with him this semester. Assignments are clear and he's very lenient with late work, gives great feedback, will respond to your emails quickly. You can see from just his syllabus that he cares a lot about helping and respecting his students. This class made me love QA!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: He made the class seem like a literature class with the word count that he demands on discussion and assignments. I am taking this class online but you can tell how strict he is and is just too extra.
